nodes.text: The Coruscant Amusement Center was a facility that was located on the planet Coruscant. During the waning years of the Galactic Republic the Humans Senator Lavina Wren and Jarid DeBell took their daughter, Night Wren, to the Coruscant Amusement Center and while there, they had a holopic taken of Night playing in a zero-g ball room. Lavina and DeBell later promised Night that they would take her to the center again for her birthday, but they were unable to do so, because Night was kidnapped by the Thaereian military.
